cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.LO, cs.CC, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of synchronizing automata, which is a topic in theoretical computer science and discrete mathematics. The use of matrices in the approach suggests that the paper may belong to the cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) sub-category. The problem of synchronizing automata is also related to formal languages and automata theory, which are covered in the cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory) sub-category. The paper may also involve some graph theory, which is covered in the cs.DM and cs.CC (Computational Complexity) sub-categories. Finally, the use of matrices in the approach suggests that the paper may also belong to the cs.SY (Systems and Control) sub-category.
